properties.name: copilot.security.anti-duplicate-submit
properties.description: 是否要开启防止重复提交, 开始@AntiDupSubmit注解支持

properties.name: copilot.security.auth-center-enabled
properties.description: 认证中心提供基于用户名密码方式的登录功能, 如果启用, 用户需要注册一个UserDetailsService实现

properties.name: copilot.security.clear-on-start
properties.description: 是否启动就执行过期token清理

properties.name: copilot.security.context-path
properties.description: SpringBoot应用的ContentPath或者是Nginx那边反向代理配置的location前缀

properties.name: copilot.security.login-url
properties.description: 如果启动认证中心模式, 配置登录URL, 默认 /login

properties.name: copilot.security.logout-url
properties.description: 如果启动认证中心模式, 配置登出URL, 默认 /logout

properties.name: copilot.security.max-retries
properties.description: 登录失败允许的重试次数, 默认5次

properties.name: copilot.security.password-encrypted
properties.description: 表单登录时, 传输的密码是否RSA公钥加密传输

properties.name: copilot.security.pic-code.enabled
properties.description: 是否要集成验证码功能, 访问URL /pic-code

properties.name: copilot.security.pic-code.ttl
properties.description: 图片验证码多久过期, 默认5分钟

properties.name: copilot.security.rate-limit
properties.description: 是否要对应用限流, 开启@RateLimit注解支持

properties.name: copilot.security.role-prefix
properties.description:
Spring Security的RoleVoter在投票的时候, 会检查@Secured("ROLE_ADMIN")等注解上是否写了ROLE_前缀

如果不想要加ROLE_前缀或者想配置另外一个前缀, 可以通过这个配置项来指定

properties.name: copilot.security.token-encrypted
properties.description:
Token是否加密处理过

客户端将请求的URI, access_toen, 客户端当前的timestamp用公钥加密, 将加密后的字符串作为access_token传递过来

先组合成这样一个字符串 uri=/saleOrder/search&access_token=dHDG13ms4868gFNfuk×tamp=123128371823

再对这个字符串做RSA公钥加密, 加密后作为Authorization请求头传入, 同时请求的URL后面要加上timestamp=123128371823参数

properties.name: copilot.xss.enabled
properties.description: 是否要开启抗XSS攻击, 默认false
